comment.body:
Are you using a script to pull down the news? If so what? 
I really think that zeronet is ideal for News, and social media. 
My question is how bad the latency on posting news articles on getting out to people/followers.

Freenet is so dam slow. They need to fix the speed some how. I have waited up to 14 hours for a page to show up. It is unusable in my view. Unless you like going back in time and experience what it was like to use a 300 baud modem. If event that.
